body_html:
Hi @achowdhery
I also using front camera, I detected bounding boxes correct.
Now I have added the tracking module by tensorflow/examples/android demo.
However, when i tracking object, The target box is always moving in the opposite direction to the left and right.
Can you give me some advice？Thanks.

body:
Hi @achowdhery 
I also using front camera, I detected bounding boxes correct.
Now I have added the tracking module by tensorflow/examples/android demo.
However, when i tracking object, The target box is always moving in the opposite direction to the left and right. 
Can you give me some advice？Thanks.
